scripts.audit-fix: (npm run audit-fix:acedirect || echo "") && (npm run audit-fix:acedirect-kurento || echo "") && (npm run audit-fix:fendesk || echo "") && (npm run audit-fix:fognito || echo "") && (npm run audit-fix:kms-share || echo "") && (npm run audit-fix:managementportal || echo "") && (npm run audit-fix:mserver || echo "") && (npm run audit-fix:videomail-service || echo "")
scripts.test: npm run test:acedirect && npm run test:acedirect-kurento && npm run test:fendesk && npm run test:fognito && npm run test:kms-share && npm run test:managementportal && npm run test:mserver && npm run test:videomail-service
scripts.preinstall: echo 'preinstall...' && npm run copygithooks && npm i -g eslint && npm i -g gulp && npm i -g bower && npm i -g pm2 && npm i -g yarn && npm install -g jsonlint && npm install -g mocha && cp acedirect/patches/itrslookup_test.txt scripts/itrslookup.sh && chmod 755 scripts/itrslookup.sh
scripts.build: touch /tmp/asterisk.csr && npm run copygithooks && npm run build:fendesk && npm run build:fognito && npm run build:kms-share && npm run build:mserver && npm run build:managementportal && npm run build:acedirect && npm run build:acedirect-kurento && npm run build:videomail-service && cat dat/ad.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules >/dev/null 2>&1 && npm run clean:acedirect && npm run clean:acedirect-kurento && npm run clean:fendesk && npm run clean:fognito && npm run clean:kms-share && npm run clean:managementportal && npm run clean:mserver && npm run clean:videomail-service
scripts.clean:logs: npm run clean:logs:acedirect && npm run clean:logs:acedirect-kurento && npm run clean:logs:fendesk && npm run clean:logs:fognito && npm run clean:logs:kms-share && npm run clean:logs:managementportal && npm run clean:logs:mserver && npm run clean:logs:videomail-service
scripts.lint: npm run lint:acedirect-kurento && npm run lint:fendesk && npm run lint:fognito && npm run lint:kms-share && npm run lint:mserver && npm run lint:videomail-service
scripts.config: cd acedirect-kurento && npm run config && sudo touch /tmp/asterisk.csr && sudo chmod 644 /tmp/asterisk.csr
scripts.build:acedirect-kurento: cd acedirect-kurento && rm -rf node_modules && npm run build
